Package com.openxc.measurements

All possible types of measurements that can be obtained from a vehicle.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Measurement
    The Measurement is the base for all OpenXC measurements.
    Measurement.Listener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceleratorPedalPosition
    The AcceleratorPedalPosition is the percentage the pedal is depressed.
    AcceleratorPedalPositionTest  
    BaseMeasurement<TheUnit extends Unit>
    The BaseMeasurement is the base implementation of the Measurement, and wraps an instance of a Unit, and the value it returns is always in terms of this Unit.
    BrakePedalStatus
    The BrakePedalStatus measurement knows if the brake pedal is pressed.
    BrakePedalStatusTest  
    EngineSpeed
    The EngineSpeed measurement represents the speed of the engine.
    EngineSpeedTest  
    EventedMeasurement<TheUnit extends Unit>  
    FuelConsumed
    The FuelConsumed is the fuel consumed since the vehicle was started.
    FuelConsumedTest  
    FuelLevel
    The FuelLevel is the current level of fuel in the gas tank.
    FuelLevelTest  
    HeadlampStatus
    The HeadlampStatus measurement knows if the headlamps are off or on.
    HeadlampStatusTest  
    HighBeamStatus
    The HighBeamStatus measurement knows if the high beams are on.
    HighBeamStatusTest  
    IgnitionStatus
    The IgnitionStatus is the current status of the vehicle's ignition.
    Latitude
    The Latitude is the current latitude of the vehicle in degrees according to GPS.
    LatitudeTest  
    Longitude
    The Longitude is the current longitude of the vehicle in degrees according to GPS.
    LongitudeTest  
    Odometer
    The Odometer is a persistent odometer recording.
    OdometerTest  
    ParkingBrakeStatus
    The ParkingBrakeStatus measurement knows if the parking brake is engaged or not.
    ParkingBrakeStatusTest  
    SteeringWheelAngle
    The SteeringWheelAngle is the angle of the steering wheel.
    SteeringWheelAngleTest  
    TorqueAtTransmission
    The TorqueAtTransmission is the actual current torque in the transmission.
    TorqueAtTransmissionTest  
    TransmissionGearPosition
    The TransmissionGearPosition is the actual current gear of the transmission.
    TransmissionGearPositionTest  
    TurnSignalStatus  
    TurnSignalStatusTest  
    VehicleButtonEvent
    A ButtonEvent represents a button press, release or hold on the vehicle HMI.
    VehicleDoorStatus
    A DoorStatus represents a door's ajar status.
    VehicleSpeed
    The VehicleSpeed is the current forward speed of the vehicle.
    VehicleSpeedTest  
    WindshieldWiperStatus  
    WindshieldWiperStatusTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IgnitionStatus.IgnitionPosition  
    TransmissionGearPosition.GearPosition  
    TurnSignalStatus.TurnSignalPosition  
    VehicleButtonEvent.ButtonAction
    The ButtonAction is the specific event that occurred.
    VehicleButtonEvent.ButtonId
    The ButtonId is the direction of a button within a single control cluster.
    VehicleDoorStatus.DoorId
    The DoorId is the specific door of the vehicle.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnrecognizedMeasurementTypeException  

Package com.openxc.measurements Description

All possible types of measurements that can be obtained from a vehicle.
